discovery_rule.name: ZFS dataset discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discover ZFS datasets. Dataset names must contain a "/" else it's a zpool root.

item_prototype.name: Zpool {#POOLNAME} available
item_prototype.description: Yes, the zpool name is also the first dataset, so we can get info from zfs.dataset.info.

item_prototype.name: Zpool {#POOLNAME} used
item_prototype.description: Yes, the zpool name is also the first dataset, so we can get info from zfs.dataset.info.

trigger.expression: {Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.arc.max.file.last()}<>{Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.arc.max.sys.last()}
trigger.name: ZFS arc max config is not applied on {HOST.NAME} (conf={ITEM1.LASTVALUE}, sys={ITEM2.LASTVALUE})

trigger.expression: ({Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.arc.max.syspromille.last()}<30 or {Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.arc.max.syspromille.last()}>850)
trigger.name: ZFS arc max {ITEM.VALUE} not between 30 and 850 on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: herman at 2017-05-03: """sp servers hebben vaak tot 80% ofzo aan ARC. pve nodes hebben van de 128GB, 4GB tot 32GB aan ARC"""
